explanation: Funds are required in the Small Arms and Landing Party Ammunition budget line item for proper execution to procure various ammo for rifles and machine guns provided to the Government of Ukraine. These funds were originally transferred to the Infantry Weapons Ammunition budget line item in Ukraine Replacement Transfer Fund Tranche #27 (FY 25-04 IR) due to an improper database entry. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available from the Infantry Weapons Ammunition budget line item provided as part of Ukraine Replacement Transfer Fund Tranche #27 (FY 25-04 IR) due to an improper database entry. These funds should have been transferred to the Small Arms and Landing Party Ammunition budget line

Funds are required in the Combat Support Munitions budget line item for proper execution to procure demolition charges provided to the Government of Ukraine. These funds were originally transferred to the Artillery Munitions budget line item in Ukraine Replacement Tranche #26 (FY 24-65 IR) due to an improper database entry. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available from the Artillery Munitions budget line item provided as part of Ukraine Replacement Transfer Fund Tranche #26 (FY 24-65 IR) due to an improper database entry. These funds should have been transferred to the Combat Support Munitions budget line item to procure demolition charges and must be realigned to that budget line item for proper execution. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
